name: Platelet Hell
description:
As a white blood cell, it is your duty to protect the body from bacteria. Help immunize the network from intruding organisms! Fly in the blood stream, utilize your vaccines to fight off the infections, and collect T-Cells to help defend the body.

Made by Jamie Powers (@nanossis) and Sam Anderson (@tasteylunch) for Games Den Quicker Game Jam 2022
 

Controls

Controller support available!

Arrow keys - Move

X - Shoot

Z/Shift - Focus

Enter - Confirm

Esc/Enter - Pause

Check out the soundtrack if you want

https://tasteylunch.bandcamp.com/album/platelet-hell-ost
